data.lyric:
[ti:MET GALA (Explicit)]
[ar:Gunna]
[al:WUNNA (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]MET GALA (Explicit) - Gunna
[00:01.05]Lyrics by：Sergio Kitchens/Wesley Tyler Glass
[00:02.11]It's easy to slip don't want you to fall
[00:06.17]Might drip on this b***h like Met Gala ballin'
[00:10.58]Answer her texts don't answer her calls
[00:16.00]Yeah she sent me a text I don't answer her call
[00:18.36]She love when I flex and shop in the mall
[00:20.61]Relieving her stress I beat down her walls
[00:22.46]Skeet-skeet on her chest she kissin' my balls
[00:24.63]We speed in that 'Vette don't stop for the laws
[00:26.58]VVs on my neck I shine in the dark
[00:28.77]It's easy to slip don't want you to fall
[00:30.82]Walk in with the drip at Met Gala Ball
[00:32.85]Shoot your s**t up I got accurate aim
[00:34.77]Poured up a few mil' now I'm back like I came
[00:36.78]That boy say my name I went and got me some strain
[00:38.86]You know I don't crash I just stay in my lane
[00:41.11]Please don't compare because we not the same
[00:42.94]GunWun ain't no gimmick ain't clownin' for fame
[00:45.00]I trapped for a living and been had a name
[00:47.01]Work hard for these clothes cars and watches and chains
[00:49.23]Oh man Rolls-Royce got umbrellas this whip for the rain
[00:52.17]These folks done f**ked up let me slip in the game
[00:54.19]This b***h let me f**k this s**t went to her brain
[00:56.24]She know I'm a beast it ain't easy to tame
[00:58.31]She squirt on my sheets while I beat out her frame
[01:00.39]Dozed off woke back up she still sayin' my name
[01:02.40]In love with my life and you wish we could trade
[01:05.26]Yeah she sent me a text I don't answer her call
[01:07.57]She love when I flex and shop in the mall
[01:09.63]Relieving her stress I beat down her walls
[01:11.67]Skeet-skeet on her chest she kissin' my balls
[01:13.77]We speed in that 'Vette don't stop for the laws
[01:15.95]VVs on my neck I shine in the dark
[01:17.88]It's easy to slip don't want you to fall
[01:19.85]Walk in with the drip at Met Gala Ball
[01:21.97]Walk in with the drip like Met Gala Ball
[01:24.13]Came in and she strip her panties and all
[01:26.17]Lip gloss on her lip suck me like a ho
[01:28.06]A boss and a pimp I bought me a ship
[01:30.09]I walk with a limp FN in my drawers
[01:32.22]When she talk that s**t I put d**k in her jaws
[01:34.30]I hit and don't miss ain't no win lose or draw
[01:36.47]Hit and don't miss ain't no win lose or draw
[01:38.53]Came from Flat Shoals and Old Nat
[01:39.78]On the South in that back you get whacked then get shot in your car
[01:42.51]Why hell you think that I'm maxin'
[01:44.08]Relaxin' in mansions no cappin' 'cause we had it hard
[01:46.69]I ain't get this s**t just from askin'
[01:48.13]I made this s**t happen and passion it played a big part
[01:50.77]I ain't get this b***h off of mackin'
[01:52.21]It came off of actions and fashion and stay in accord
[01:54.67]Yeah she sent me a text I don't answer her call
[01:56.74]She love when I flex and shop in the mall
[01:58.90]Relieving her stress I beat down her walls
[02:00.93]Skeet-skeet on her chest she kissin' my balls
[02:02.90]We speed in that 'Vette don't stop for the laws
[02:04.93]VVs on my neck I shine in the dark
[02:06.98]It's easy to slip don't want you to fall
[02:09.06]Walk in with the drip at Met Gala Ball
data.trans:
[ti:MET GALA (Explicit)]
[ar:Gunna]
[al:WUNNA (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.05]//
[00:02.11]很容易摔倒 不想让你跌倒
[00:06.17]可能给这女人穿金戴银 就像参加Met Gala晚会一样 有钱
[00:10.58]回她的信息 不回她的电话
[00:16.00]她给我发短信 我不接她电话
[00:18.36]在我炫富和购物的时候 她觉得很开心
[00:20.61]排解她的压力 我摧毁了她的心墙
[00:22.46]和她激情缠绵 她悉心伺候我
[00:24.63]我们开着雪佛兰科尔维特飞驰 从来不守交通规则
[00:26.58]脖子上戴着钻石 在黑暗中闪闪发光
[00:28.77]很容易摔倒 不想让你跌倒
[00:30.82]在Met Gala晚会上 穿金戴银 华丽登场
[00:32.85]对你一击致命 我瞄得准确无误
[00:34.77]花了几百万 现在我回来了 就像当初那样
[00:36.78]那小子说了我的名字 我去给自己整了点好东西
[00:38.86]你知道我不会出事 我会管好自己的事
[00:41.11]请不要跟我比 因为我们不是一类人
[00:42.94]我可没有玩噱头 不会为了名声扮小丑
[00:45.00]我为了生计做街头生意 混出了名
[00:47.01]拼命干活 就是为了这些衣服 车子 手表和金链子
[00:49.23]朋友 劳斯莱斯配备专用雨伞 这辆车适合雨天开
[00:52.17]这些家伙完蛋了 让我加入这场游戏
[00:54.19]这女人让我和她缠绵 这玩意儿让她上头了
[00:56.24]她知道我是个野兽 不容易驯服
[00:58.31]她在我的床上释放欲望 我让她快活至极
[01:00.39]晕了过去 又醒了过来 她还是在念我的名字
[01:02.40]爱上了我的生活 你希望我们可以交换人生
[01:05.26]她给我发短信 我不接她电话
[01:07.57]在我炫富和购物的时候 她觉得很开心
[01:09.63]排解她的压力 我摧毁了她的心墙
[01:11.67]和她激情缠绵 她悉心伺候我
[01:13.77]我们开着雪佛兰科尔维特飞驰 从来不守交通规则
[01:15.95]脖子上戴着钻石 在黑暗中闪闪发光
[01:17.88]很容易摔倒 不想让你跌倒
[01:19.85]在Met Gala晚会上 穿金戴银 华丽登场
[01:21.97]就像参加Met Gala晚会一样 穿金戴银 华丽登场
[01:24.13]一来到我的面前 她就开始宽衣解带
[01:26.17]她涂着漂亮的唇彩 在我身上到处亲
[01:28.06]我是个老板 管理着女人 我给自己买了一艘船
[01:30.09]我走路一瘸一拐 因为手枪塞在我的裤子里
[01:32.22]当她叽叽喳喳不停说的时候 我就堵住她的嘴
[01:34.30]我一出击 绝不失手 不可能失败 不可能退缩
[01:36.47]出手必胜 不可能失败 不可能退缩
[01:38.53]以前过得穷困潦倒
[01:39.78]在南方 偏僻小路上 你被人干掉 车都被打烂
[01:42.51]为何你会认为我已经使出浑身解数
[01:44.08]在豪宅里放松身心 没有骗人 因为我们就是很有钱
[01:46.69]这些东西可不是我求别人给的
[01:48.13]这是我亲手创造的 激情也占了很大部分功劳
[01:50.77]我绝不会让这些成果付诸东流
[01:52.21]这一切都来自我的努力 我的才能 我的坚持不懈
[01:54.67]她给我发短信 我不接她电话
[01:56.74]在我炫富和购物的时候 她觉得很开心
